newest.message:
# Release v4.0.2
## Bug Fixes - Fix race condition that could sometimes count implants more than once - Fix potential crash while querying implants - Fix skill training intervals sometimes being reported incorrectly for characters which have not logged in since multiple skills were trained - Fix issue which could prevent querying of character location and wallet balance - Fix null reference exception on research points tab
## Contributors - Peter Han - Bravojul - SamuelHusky - wvdvegt - wbSD

release.message:
# Release v4.0.3
## Bug Fixes - Fix race condition loading local cache images - Fix improperly stored local kill mail cache - Fix issues saving structure and character names to local cache - Fix a crash when editing skill plans - Fix crashes during extended downtime - Fix crashes when skill queue is empty - Fix window flashing during character loading - Fix issue which could cause docked location to become out of date - Reduce notification spam when queue is fully completed
## New Features - Performance improvements during window load - Private citadels will work better, especially in assets, market orders, industry jobs, and wallet transactions - Add debug information for TrustFailure errors - Update the About EVEMon dialog
## Contributors - Peter Han - SpeedProg - wbSD
